page.title: 04LIVING IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: Mr Bonney has lived in the village for about 30 years.He is now retired but he still works as hard as he did when he was working.He enjoys living in their house because he designed it himself and he had it built to his own quantity.He worked in Lutterworth in charge of a foundry and enginering works and another one in Slough which is near London and another in Essex.He likes living in the village because one gets to know every body.He joins in lots of things that go on in the village like the Drama Group,the Parish Council and lots of other things like that.He has been living in his present house for 20 years.He has 2 dachshunds one long haired and one rough haired.He has been retired for 11 years.While he was working he flew right round the world.He went to New Zealand,Tasmania,Canada & America.
